title: The Moss House
description: In the mid-nineteenth century, neighbouring Yorkshire landowners Miss Lister and Miss Walker find their lives entwined in a passionate, forbidden relationship - but the world is not yet ready for Anne Lister, the larger-than-life scholar, traveller and mountaineer. The lovers retreat to the Moss House, a private sanctuary away from disapproving eyes; but their tranquility cannot last as they are drawn into the turmoil of a changing society and a divided family that tests their love for each other. In The Moss House, we discover Anne Lister's lifelong struggle to be her true self as she finally finds love with Ann Walker and together they strive to live the life they have battled so long for.
author: Clara Barley
